attributes.description:
At Kia Silverlakes we pride ourselves on delivering quality used vehicles to our clients. All our vehicles undergo a 125 quality point check, roadworthy and valet before being displayed on our showroom floor. All vehicles are delivered with a full service history and are accident free. The one thing we pride ourselves in more than anything is EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE. When buying a vehicle from us, you join the Kia Family and family look after each other. We will tailor make a package that will not only suit your needs but your pocket too. We deal through all major financial institutions and always pride ourselves on giving you the best deal. CALL NOW and one of our experienced Sales Executives will gladly bring the vehicle out to you to test drive from the comfort of your own home or workplace. CALL NOW and you could be driving off in the car of yours dreams.

Nationwide delivery. All Trade-in's welcome. Finance can be arranged, Contact us today! Price excludes on the road fees.

attributes.title: 2022 Kia Picanto 1.0 Start

attributes.description:
2021 Kia Picanto 1.0 Street (face lift)
Excellent fuel saver, easy to drive, perfect 1st car. Vehicle has a complete android auto, Apple CarPlay infotainment system.
Reverse camera, multi-function steering controls with trip monitor. Front and rear electric windows, A/C, USB, aux etc.
Balance of service plan, 5 year unlimited mileage warranty.  Trade Ins welcome, Finance can be arranged with all major banks by our finance team.
All vehicles go through our 125 point check, and dekra roadworthy ensuring peace of mind motoring. 
Enquire now for assistance.

attributes.description:
Finding a high quality, reliable pre-owned vehicle can be complicated. Thatâ€™s why Kia Northcliff offers a straightforward, risk-free solution to purchasing your next pre-owned vehicle. We take pride in the quality of our pre-owned vehicles by thoroughly inspecting and ensuring their roadworthiness, authenticating service history, and verifying mileages.  

Kia Konfidence is backed by Kia Motors South Africa, and supported by a nationwide dealer network that ensures excellent trade-in evaluations and nation-wide delivery.  

You can also choose from a wide range of vehicle finance options through Kia Financial Services. Add to this a premium customer experience, and you are guaranteed many happy kilometres for years to come. Flexible finance option to suit any budget engage with our experienced trustworthy team today.
